name: Phantasy Star Online: Blue Burst
description:
Phantasy Star Online: Blue Burst is an action-RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Sonic Team. It came out on 13-06-2005. SEGA published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Phantasy Star Online: Blue Burst is available on PC.
Yuji Naka produced the game. Takao Miyoshi directed the game. It was scored by Fumie Kumatani and Hideaki Kobayashi.
